nodes.text: The Katarn estate was the farmland on Sulon owned by the Katarn family. It lay to the west of the meeting place of the Rebels.

It bordered the Danga estate, and contained the Katarn family compound, a solar panel, at least four pump stations, a large irrigation system, a tap tree, and variform bean crops. It was burned to the ground by Imperial commandos in a raid in 1 BBY.
